attributes.title: Absolutely Terrible

attributes.review: First it took a while to download, (37 Hours in all) but who’s counting 🤷🏻‍♀️. But anyway after I got it to download many things went wrong. I went downstairs to make a hot pocket. But I had to use the bathroom so when I came back my hot pocket was gone, the only explanation was that someone stole it I went outside to see if someone ran away with it, but as I opened the door to my humble abode my fish started running out the door. (Also if u have seen my fish pls let me know he was to fast I couldn’t get him) so anyway I think my fish took my hot pocket and ran. Then I went to the app to check it out but then my phone died. I then went to the store bcuz I couldn’t find a charger. When I walked into the store I saw some rabbits and a frog on the cracker isle. It looked like some sort of cult meeting, they tried to get me to join but I just told them I was devoted to Christ ✝️😊☺️. I would have shown y’all the whole thing but like I said that app made my phone go crazy. Then once I got me a charger I went to my car. My car wasn’t working I then looked at the front of my car and peppa pig was just straight chilling in my motor. So I convinced her to get in the car with me turns out she was hurt so we went to the er. But turns out she’s a minor so she needed momma pigs convent but she was all the way in ✨England ✨. So we just went home, but I thought it couldn’t get any worse but on my way someone gave me two rally tickets. But unfortunately I have to mow& and vaccine my roof that day. But anyway when I went home I decided to get rid of the app. Best decision of my life! ❤️❤️✨🌺🌸✝️👍🏼😘😗(also turns out peppa has a child 👶🏻 he’s two so now I have to watch him and peppa till we are able to internationally travel again 🥴- Makayla Lindsey
attributes.title: rip to my hot pocket, fish, peppa pigs leg
